CustomField.description: Manual changes necessary to ensure complete deployment (not changes that are resolved by simply deploying related "components"). Examples of manual steps include: Running scripts, setting profile permissions, deleting obsolete objects, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Manual changes necessary to ensure complete deployment (not changes that are resolved by simply deploying related "components"). Examples of manual steps include: Running scripts, setting profile permissions, deleting obsolete objects, etc.
CustomField.label: Manual Deployment Steps
